title: Expect significant growth from insurance income this year: City Union Bank MD
description: City Union Bank, led by N Kamakodi, aims for significant growth in insurance income to Rs 55 crore in FY'24, with a PAT of Rs 1,016 crore and NIM within guidance levels.
